document.full_text: a technology consultant violated insider-trading laws by funneling "spot-on," nonpublic information about two chipmakers' results to hedge fund managers, a prosecutor said at the start of her trial.
document.title: consultant fed "spot-on" tips to fund managers: prosecutor
lines_and_colors: a technology consultant violated insider-trading laws by funneling "spot-on," nonpublic information about two chipmakers' results to hedge fund managers, a prosecutor said at the start of her trial.
